title: Aezhu kurukku rendu nadukku Lyrics Inam Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Yezhu kurukku Rendu Nadukku
Singer: Resmi Sateesh
Movie: Inam
Music: Vishal C
Lyrics: Charukesh

Aezhu kurukku rendu nadukku
naalu peru vaaganam.
enna kaatchu oru naalukku
neeyum thaaney poganum
naanum thaaney poganum
naama sandhosama vazhanum

Aezhu kurukku rendu nadukku
naalu peru vaaganam.

Naalu madi kaaranam
poradhu paadathaan.
naadhiyaththa naangalum
povadhu melathaan. (2)

Pogum vazhi padhayellaam onnuthaan
Pogum vazhi padhayellaam onnuthaan
angae pona pinne sondham
namakku mannuthaan.

Sonnaa kelunga..idhu unmai thaanunga
Sonnaa kelunga..idhu unmai thaanunga

Aezhu kurukku rendu nadukku
naalu peru vaaganam.
enna kaatchu oru naalukku
neeyum thaaney poganum
naanum thaaney poganum
ayya poye thaana theeranum
naama sandhosama vazhanum

Aezhu kurukku rendu nadukku
naalu peru vaaganam.
